longBusinessSummary: Toyota Boshoku Corporation develops, manufactures, and sells automotive interior systems in Japan, the United States, China, and internationally. It also engages in manufacturing and sale of automotive filters and powertrain components, and other automotive components, as well as fabric products. The company provides automobile, aircraft, and railway seats, such as executive lounge and sports seats including seat frames, round recliners, and long slide rails. In addition, it offers interior and exterior products, which includes door trims, headliners, floor carpets, and luggage and exterior components comprising bumpers, fender liners, and engine undercovers. The company also provides filter products including air, oil, and cabin air filters; air induction systems and cleaners, intake manifolds, cylinder headcovers, oil mist separator, and timing chain covers; and electric powertrain related products, such as motor core constitute and fuel cell parts, separators, and ion exchangers, as well as anti-droplet partitions and weets. Further, it offers curtain-shield airbags, straps and seatbelt webbings, and seat fabrics. Additionally, the company provides transportation services; and contracting of design work. Toyota Boshoku Corporation was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Kariya, Japan.
